Uses of Interface
popt4jlib.SubjectIntf

  • Packages that use SubjectIntf 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib
    popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
    popt4jlib.GA
    Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.PS
    Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.PS.FA
    Firefly Algorithm Parallel Implementation.

    • Uses of SubjectIntf in popt4jlib

      Methods in popt4jlib with parameters of type SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ObserverIntf.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      called by a subject monitored when it changes its state.

    • Uses of SubjectIntf in popt4jlib.GA

      Classes in popt4jlib.GA that implement SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DGA
      The DGA class implements a thread-safe parallel Distributed Genetic Algorithm that follows the island-model of GA computation, with an elitist selection strategy that uses roulette-wheel selection of individuals based on their fitness (that is computed every generation).
      Methods in popt4jlib.GA with parameters of type SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void DGA.addSubjectIncumbent(SubjectIntf subject, java.lang.Object soln)
      add the soln into a hashmap maintaining (SubjectIntf, Object soln) pairs so that the soln is inserted in the first DGAThread's population in the next iteration.
      void DGA.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will add the best solution found by the subject, in the _subjects' solutions map, to be later picked up by the first DGAThread spawned by this DGA object.

    • Uses of SubjectIntf in popt4jlib.GradientDescent

      Methods in popt4jlib.GradientDescent with parameters of type SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AlternatingVariablesDescent.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will call its minimize() method, and add the result back into the subject object.
      void ArmijoSteepestDescentST.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will call its minimize() method, and add the result back into the subject object.
      void FletcherConjugateGradientST.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will add the best solution found by the subject, in the _observers' solutions map
      void PolakRibiereConjugateGradientST.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will set the best solution found by the subject, as the initial point to start the PRCG optimization process, and upon completion of the optimization process, it will add back the new solution to the subject by calling the subject's addIncumbent(this,sol) method.

    • Uses of SubjectIntf in popt4jlib.PS

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS that implement SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DPSO
      A parallel implementation of the Particle Swarm Optimization algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects.
      Methods in popt4jlib.PS with parameters of type SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void DPSO.addSubjectIncumbent(SubjectIntf subject, java.lang.Object soln)
      add the soln into a hashmap maintaining (SubjectIntf, Object soln) pairs so that the soln is inserted in the first DPSOThread's population in the next iteration.
      void DPSO.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will add the best solution found by the subject, in the _subjects' solutions map to be later picked up by the first DPSOThread spawned by this DPSO object.

    • Uses of SubjectIntf in popt4jlib.PS.FA

      Classes in popt4jlib.PS.FA that implement SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DFA
      A parallel implementation of the Firefly Algorithm for function optimization, implementing also the SubjectIntf and ObserverIntf objects.
      Methods in popt4jlib.PS.FA with parameters of type SubjectIntf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void DFA.addSubjectIncumbent(SubjectIntf subject, java.lang.Object soln)
      add the soln into a hashmap maintaining (SubjectIntf, Object soln) pairs so that the soln is inserted in the first DFAThread's population in the next iteration.
      void DFA.notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
      when a subject's thread calls the method notifyChange, in response, this object will add the best solution found by the subject, in the _subjects' solutions map to be later picked up by the first DFAThread spawned by this DFA object.
